# docker cache

Cache all related docker images locally

## Usage
```sh
$ dinghy docker cache [options]
$ dinghy docker populate-local-cache [options]
```
## Options
| Name            | Description           | Default                   |
| ---------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------- |
| `--[no]-ignore-local-cache` | Ignore local cache and force repopulate | `true`  |
